name: Starry Orbit
description:
Welcome to Starry Orbit! Starry Orbit is a hypercasual die-and-retry game made for a young audience.

The player controls the movements of a small moon orbiting around its planet. 

For the sake of that planet, they must destroy various enemies by pushing them away or avoiding them.

In order to stay alive for as long as possible, quick and precise movements are necessary.

As time passes, you will be able to protect other planets in the Milky Way, too. 

But watch out... every planet has different movement properties! 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • All the credits are in the game in the "?" menu.
  • I am a Game Design student, and this project was my very first game. 
  • It was made in one month using Unity and Bolt for visual scripting.
Please feel free to give me any feedback or bug reports you may encounter. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

And most importantly, have fun ❤!
